verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:1
verses.text: And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem, he gathered of the house of Judah and Benjamin an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen men, which were warriors, to fight against Israel, that he might bring the kingdom again to Rehoboam.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:2
verses.text: But the word of the Lord came to Shemaiah the man of God, saying,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:3
verses.text: Speak unto Rehoboam the son of Solomon, king of Judah, and to all Israel in Judah and Benjamin, saying,
